name: Path of the ninja (Pizza_Waifu)
description:
Controls:

-wasd: move and control projectiles

-U: throws shuriken

-I;slash

O:casts shadow

Credits:

-Musician: Dekkanoid  https://www.youtube.com/user/amfgpie

-Programmer, artist: Diego Viejo (instagram) @my_waifu_is_a_pizza

This is my entry for the Mix and Game Jam!

it is also my first ever jam, and i did almost everything, so im afraid it is not finished :( but i did tried my best and I hope you enjoy it.
